message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. I believe its unique features and benefits are unparalleled in the market, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to achieve excellence in their field. For this reason, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $2000000. I trust that you will find its value to be well beyond the investment, and I look forward to discussing how it can elevate your endeavors.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to match the $2000000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.
